text:
Hello,

when the LuaRoot Path is relative, the request is not fulfilled.
The apache works well with a absolute LuaRoot.

I have tested it with a own build on Sun/Solaris and on a Debian-Testing-Build (2.4.10-1)


Own build Apache on Sun/Solaris:
crash with a segmentation fault (11).
used lua libraries: liblua 5.2.3 & 5.1.5 from lua.org.

Debian:
raised a 500 error.
error.log:
[Mon Aug 18 20:53:13.783426 2014] [lua:error] [pid 9916] AH01482: Error loading \x85\xc0u\xd6f\x0f\x1fD: cannot open \x85\xc0u\xd6f\x0f\x1fD: No such file or directory
[Mon Aug 18 20:53:13.783502 2014] [lua:crit] [pid 9916] [client ::1:58114] AH01477: lua: Failed to obtain lua interpreter for entry function 'fonds_redirect' in fonds_translate.lua


Greats,
Sascha
creator: inu@inusasha.de
